minNumObj.description: Minimum number of instances per leaf

numFolds.description: Determines the amount of data used for reduced-error pruning. One fold is used for pruning, the rest for growing the tree.

reducedErrorPruning.description: Whether reduced-error pruning is used instead of C.4.5 pruning.

subTreeRaising.description: Whether to consider the subtree raising operation when pruning.

useLaplace.description: Whether counts at leaves are smoothed based on Laplace
